articles.author: ALEXA ST. JOHN, WILL WEISSERT
articles.title: Biden is marking Earth Day by announcing $7 billion in federal solar power grants - The Associated Press
articles.description: President Joe Biden is marking Earth Day by announcing $7 billion in federal grants to provide residential solar projects serving 900,000-plus households in low- and middle-income communities. The Democrat also plans to expand his New Deal-style American Clim…
articles.content: WASHINGTON (AP) President Joe Biden is marking Earth Day by announcing $7 billion in federal grants for residential solar projects serving 900,000-plus households in low- and middle-income communitie… [+5633 chars]

articles.title: Steve Rosenberg: Russia defiant over new US aid to Ukraine - BBC.com
articles.description: Pro-Kremlin media and Russian officials claim America is "getting dragged into" a war it will lose.
